title: Ketu Transit in the 4th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting the fourth house brings emotional detachment from home, comfort, and familiar environments for Leo ascendants. Inner security is questioned, prompting a search for peace beyond external stability. Domestic matters may feel distant, yet this phase supports minimalism, inner grounding, and quiet restructuring of personal space. When emotional withdrawal is balanced with responsibility, Ketu creates calm foundations rooted in inner stability rather than dependence.

sections.heading: Career
points: Focus dips due to inner processing
Strength in research or solitary roles

closing: This transit redefines emotional security. By anchoring peace within, Ketu builds a calm and resilient inner home.
